column4: Hi Guys. first timer installing ubuntu. Got stuck at Installing the base system step...
first guess there is 'bad cd'
At about 6%, it complains about not being able to download smome package & then gives an error & stops
i tried with 2 different CDs
inboth cases, it gets stuck at 6%
so there is surely, sthing else going wrong
you burned these yourself?
One via post, the other i burned frm iso..
if the cd's are good, my next guess is bad hard drive or damaged filesystem - you could try reformatting
I did,, that doesnt complain at all..
formatting seems all good.
happen to know what package and the text of the error message?
question ? WHat are the basic partitions needed ?
I have root, /home & swap memory
you can get away with just / - how to partition depends on how you plan to use it
the errors go of too fast, cant really tell which one is the first
it seems to be some ;libraries..
any other ideas, other than bad disk,?
bad cdrom drive?  it totally sounds like the problem is with getting a package from the cd to the hard drive, in which case it's either the media or a hardware issue
you could try flight5 and see if you have better luck with that
flight5 ?
sort of a preview of the next version
